metadata.description: Agent Skills for NeMo Evaluator SDK

plugins.name: nel-assistant
plugins.description: Interactive assistant for NeMo Evaluator Launcher. Guides you through configuring, running, and monitoring model evaluations with support for SLURM and Local executors, all deployment types (vLLM, SGLang, NIM, TRT-LLM), and auto-exporters (MLflow, W&B).
